articles.description: Liverpool agree a £116m deal, which includes a guaranteed £100m, to sign Germany attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz from Bayer Leverkusen.

articles.description: Reaction to the appointment of Thomas Frank as the new Tottenham Hotspur manager, as the Dane leaves Brentford after seven years in charge.

articles.description: Pakistan batter Babar Azam will play in the Big Bash for the first time after he is signed by Sydney Sixers.

articles.description: The final leg of Grand Slam Track - the athletics competition backed by Olympic great Michael Johnson - is cancelled because of economic concerns.
articles.title: Grand Slam Track: Final event of Michael Johnson-backed athletics competition cancelled

articles.description: Thomas Frank's move to Spurs is a risk for the charismatic Dane - but he has earned the big opportunity, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Thomas Frank to Spurs: Move from Brentford to Tottenham is risky but Danish manager earned chance

articles.description: With Florian Wirtz set to join the £100m club, BBC Sport looks at the most expensive football signings.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz to Liverpool: Who are the most expensive football signings?

articles.description: Unbeaten heavyweight Moses Itauma will face fellow Briton Dillian Whyte in Saudi Arabia on 16 August.
articles.title: Moses Itauma vs Dillian Whyte: British heavyweights to fight in Saudi on 16 August

articles.description: Australian Olympian Heath Ryan has been suspended by Equestrian Australia after a video emerged of him 'repeatedly whipping' a horse
articles.title: Heath Ryan suspended for whipping a horse
